code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{BASE_URL}from"../utils";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NoteList=()=>{const[notes,setNote]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{getNotes();},[]);const getNotes=async()=>{const response=await axios.get(`${BASE_URL}/notes`);setNote(response.data);};const deleteNote=async id=>{try{await axios.delete(`${BASE_URL}/${id}`);getNotes();}catch(error){console.log(error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-5 has-text-centered",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"title is-2",children:"Notes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"columns is-centered",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"column is-half",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{className:"table is-striped is-fullwidth",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"has-text-centered",children:"Judul"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"has-text-centered",children:"Isi"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{className:"has-text-centered",children:"Actions"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:notes.map(note=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:note.judul}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:note.isi}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`edit/${note.id}`,className:"button is-small is-info mr-2",children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteNote(note.id),className:"button is-small is-danger",children:"Delete"})]})]},note.id))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mt-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`add`,className:"button is-success is-medium",children:"Add New"})})]})})]});};export default NoteList;
